item.description:
Why is the repeal or nullification of Obamacare essential to our freedom and America's survival?

How is this the most far-reaching legislation ever passed by Congress?

Why is this law more than "mere" socialized medicine?

How will it impose mandates for "proper nutrition," "parenting skills," "home visitation," abortion financing, vaccinations, database monitoring, and rationing of care?

How can the free market provide higher quality, lower-cost medical care?

Join with us for Mal's clear and understandable explanation of the attack on your country, your family and your freedom.

$5 per person in advance $7 at the door. Checks to be made out to JBS Speakers Bureau and sent to Bill mcNally 7 Blueberry Rd. Windham, NH 03087





The John Birch Society is hosting Dr. Mal Mauney. Dr. Mauney served as president of Vision Education Foundation, developing eye-care centers which render high-tech diagnostic and surgical procedures by doctors of optometry and opthalmology. Formerly a Professor of Optometry and Director of Clinics, Mal has had an active civic career holding a political party chairmanship and serving as president of the Memphis City School Board of education. He has spoken to Tea party groups on the subject of "Organizing for Effective grassroots Action." Dr. Mauney desires to preserve the world's finest medical care system in America and is eager to tell how to stop Obamacare.
item.name: Stop Obamacare, Choose Freedom,
